named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.Product product WHERE product.name LIKE :name

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_SKU
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.Product product, IN(product.allSkus) sku WHERE sku.id = :skuId

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_PRODUCTS_BY_SKU
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.Product product, IN(product.allSkus) sku WHERE sku.id = :skuId AND product.activeStartDate <= :currentDate AND (product.activeEndDate > :currentDate OR product.activeEndDate = null)

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_PRODUCTS_BY_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryProductImpl categoryProduct WHERE categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.category.id = :categoryId AND categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product.activeStartDate <= :currentDate AND (categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product.activeEndDate > :currentDate OR categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product.activeEndDate = null) ORDER BY categoryProduct.displayOrder

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryProductImpl categoryProduct WHERE categoryProduct.categoryProductXref.category.id = :categoryId ORDER BY categoryProduct.displayOrder
